website_summaries.verdict: This trellis has a lot to offer that will suit most gardeners – beauty, practical design, and inexpensive price.
pros: Ample climbing space for flowers, ivy, and vegetables that vine
Black iron arch with butterflies design
cons: Thin and flimsy – not ideal for extremely heavy plants

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: For $20 it's great. Looks just like the picture. I just got the climbing rose shrub a few days ago, and I've had to deadhead and cut some of the stems and leaves... and some of the roses fell off from me having to manhandle the stems to loop around the trellis like I wanted; but hopefully by next summer I will have trained it to "climb" the way I want it (if it hasn't died from transplant shock!). I used my foot to press the two legs into the soil, seems to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Gal OutTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Product. Carefully shipped.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Used three in my garden and for my creeping Jasmine these are perfect. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Denis

customer_reviews.title: It looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for morning glories and moonflowers. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love the butterflies
customer_reviews.text: The trellises came right on time. They are lightweight but sturdy and look great in the front of the house. I love the butterfly design and hope that the flowers draw some live ones! The Bougainvillea took right off climbing and the Madevilla sanderi are starting. Overall, a very classy look.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Cute trellis
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy taller trellises from the same manufacturer, but their price has almost doubled, so I purchased these instead. At about $12 per trellis they are a reasonable value. The quality is similar to  and these have been in my garden for a year with just a little bit of fading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for something more sturdy then I would advise looking for something else
customer_reviews.text: A little light on the weight but suitable for what I wanted. If you're looking for something more sturdy then I would advise looking for something else. But for me I wanted it to fill space behind our water fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Intense

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of the height after installation
customer_reviews.text: It is very pretty. The only thing to be aware of is the height. I drove the stakes into the ground almost up to where the cross bar is, for stability due to the placement in my garden. The product height is 60" from the end of the stake to the top of the structure. After installation, I lost a lot of height. In my garden it's probably only 4 feet tall now.
customer_reviews.author: Anne L.

customer_reviews.title: Love these trellises
customer_reviews.text: This is light-weight trellis— But works great for the vines on my “potted” vegetables. I have a tiny yard but I still enjoy growing vegetables in pretty pots. These trellises were the perfect solution to “contain” my vining vegetables. Plus a very good price compared to Home Depot & Lowe’s
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and a good value. Ground stakes are extremely long, but they need to be that long because the metal is very thin and easily bent. I’m using them on my balcony as posts to extend the height of the railing to attach a faux Ivy privacy screen. Because they’re so thin I had to attach them a lot lower than I wanted because any higher and they were flapping. But overall I’m pleased because the price for four trellises was excellent. I did purchase more to finish the entire balcony.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Amazon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Strong but flexible. My 6 foot husband modeled the trellis to show its overall height.
customer_reviews.author: KSeiler

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to our side yard as we're growing in a butterfly garden. Can't say much more perfect really? Light, easy to install, they are only 5ft so can seem a bit short.....but our area was low anyway, so didnt really matter. Early picture, much more done since then!
customer_reviews.author: Mark whalley

customer_reviews.title: Butterfly delight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased five of these trellises and plan to order a sixth to complete a circular privacy nook in my butterfly garden. The trellises are very attractive and just right for light- and medium-weight vines such as clematis. I am very pleased with the butterfly design and the quality of this product. They blend beautifully into the garden I designed for attracting birds and butterflies, adding height and contrast to the shrubs and flowers and a delightful touch of whimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and attractive!
customer_reviews.text: I have some climbing roses that I got this for. I tried it with my new one and plan to use it with my other 5 when I transplant them. I will probably try a couple of other styles, but I will go with this same brand. It was ready to go out of the box, no assembly required. This beats the hassle of building lattice panels.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bryan

customer_reviews.title: A Great Garden Trellis for Climbing Plants!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and highly functional garden trellis for those climbing plants, including peas and some beans. It's the perfect size, and the 12 pack of trellises works well for multiple locations or for just rows altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Cate Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Classy and serviceable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking,stable, hopefully, the paint will last forever, appeared as described, reasonable in price. I just wish they came taller like 8 feet. I recommend them highly. Used the for my clamatis and climbing vegetable. Not too heavy altho they would be too hard for me if they were heavier.
customer_reviews.author: VGN

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my needs up against our house as individual panels. I used two on existing trellis that was to thick for clematis, and the other two below the window with a single mount at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trellis For Container Gardening
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my Jasmine climbing vine in a wide container. Sturdy, well made, and well priced. Delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Pincher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my garden
customer_reviews.text: The trellises were beautiful had a bit of problem with shipping but ET home supply went above and beyond to make sure everything was right. I'm not sure which one I like better the seller or the trellises both of them are great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: After buying a set of four and receiving only one, I returned the item. The vendor apologized and replaced them with a set of two trellises of better quality although smaller than the other ones. Happy at the efforts and grateful for the quality of the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mpere Dao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Apartment Patio!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this trellis. It is sturdy yet lightweight. I got it for the Jasmine I bought for my little patio. I love the butterflies. They add such character to the corner. No assembly needed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Cary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the garden
customer_reviews.text: These trellises are really pretty. The pictures don’t do them justice. It seems well made, it easily went into the soul of my garden, and I have sugar peas and cucumbers growing up them. Such a great addition to my garden.
customer_reviews.author: LesleyJ

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: Beware it’s very flimsy. Looks beautiful but you need your trellis to be strong. One heavy wind and it’ll topple. I opened it little too late so couldn’t return. Moreover haven’t been going out during pandemic, so just decided to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sculpture

customer_reviews.title: Quality trellis
customer_reviews.text: Using to add height for privacy and will add vines Looks nice and very sturdy. Anchored it to pre-existing wooden fence that stands 4.5 ft. These added another 15 inches in height. Intend to purchase another set and continue privacy panels.
customer_reviews.author: Linette

customer_reviews.title: it looks pretty and it is doing what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I am using this trellis for my roses. They are wieldy and grow all over the place. I put this up in order to keep them in place. I thought it would be a little taller, however, it looks pretty and it is doing what I wanted. I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 since it did not measure up to what I thought it would be like. I will probably buy another one though as it seemed to be the best deal for the money for the size I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to place
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice trellis to place in front of a pole for a climbing plant. We had a street light that was just bare in the yard area between our neighbor and us. This trellis was easy to push into the ground and lean against the black pole so it blends in well and will be nice for the plants to climb up and semi cover eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Bim Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These are quite attractive and sturdy. Used in a raised bed for morning glories. The bird design is a nice touch, just the right amount of ornamentation. Be sure it is the size you need.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Good Trellises, but bends too easily
customer_reviews.text: Good Trellises, but bends too easily. Fastened two together at a right angle with zip ties, then inserted them into the soil so they support each other. Seems to work, and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: US G-Man

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: These were very sturdy and attractive. The metal frame is about as big around as a large straw. One of the bottom times was slightly bent in the shipping but bent back into place just fine. Very stable once in place.
customer_reviews.author: April L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but to small
customer_reviews.text: They are verry pretty but they are smaller and narrower than I thouggt. I wanted them to hold my clementis and my two plants need something bigger and much sturdier to hold onto.
customer_reviews.author: E.Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great ornament- lower to the ground but wish digging feet went deeper.
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, great to wrap ivy/etc around or stand alone. Just wish the planter feet were longer to go deeper into the ground, and some type of slide-able ring/extension/foot piece- that would could be set with the digging two feet would prop it up/erect it even firmer in the ground, that would be a 5* comment.
customer_reviews.author: NeverLeavePackageOnFrontSteps!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this little trellises! I bought them for my clematis plants, but my nasturtiums took them over. They make a beautiful addition to our garden, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy C.

customer_reviews.title: Really prettied up our backyard!
customer_reviews.text: We love them, just what we expected. Bought 5 of them for our new honeysuckle plants. The boxing was a bit much, they came in individual boxes. They could of fited at least 25 in a box. But they came without any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hoag

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these and I have had many compliments on them and asked where I found something so unique. I tell everyone go to Amazon and where to look and they won't be sorry these have been more than worth the price just in the compliments from people walking by.
customer_reviews.author: bonita

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was hoping for. I purchased shepherd hooks before and was happy with them. Same again. Sturdy and heavy. The packaging was really good. Happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Wong

customer_reviews.title: Hibiscus Support
customer_reviews.text: This trellis filled the bill. We use them to support our young Hibiscus plants. They look very nice and add to the decor of our garden. I would buy again if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: David Newell

customer_reviews.title: worked well for what we wanted them for
customer_reviews.text: We brought 5 amagabeli 60"x18" .. they seem well built for what we want to use them for. all 5 are free standing in 24'"pots. we had to reinforce each with a 4 ft iron rebar in center of each. they have no strength on there own even after you place them 14 inches into the pots. we have Trangerine Beauty Crossvines and Carolina Jessamine on them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love em! I had so much fun painting the butterflies. I decided to order more but they were already out of stock so I had to look else where.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda golde

customer_reviews.title: Simple, good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, sturdy, easy handling. I though à pair but 2 pair in the box. Very cheap but looks neat. Just open the box and press.
customer_reviews.author: Misol

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why i'm giving this 2 stars. Might should be 1. Arrived with one leg bent and was too easy to straighten, meaning very thin metal that likely won't hold much up. I'm not sure how this can even be used, I bought it for a small jasmine but I doubt it will hold as the plant grows.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Practical, beautiful panels for yard.
customer_reviews.text: I attached these to my wire fence.. it gave height to the fence...so my dog stays and doesn’t jump out of the yard. It’s working and I love the cute look.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, practical and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can move these lovely panels around, placing them wherever needed. And they can be used in so many ways: yard decor, holding back rampant plant growth, or a climbing trellis for flowers. I am currently using mine to contain the rampant tomato growth in my garden. I have a few in with the mini pumpkins, too! Love these things. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: The frame is very flimsy and some of the soldered ...
customer_reviews.text: The frame is very flimsy and some of the soldered areas were loose. I am dissatisfied with item. But the hassle to return this item is not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: They are very pretty and easy to put in the ground. There was one that had come apart slightly at the top, but that's not bad considering how far they had to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Just the right height, made well enough. I have bought several of them to make a vine covered fence, my vines are climbing all over it and even in very strong winds, none of the panels have fallen over.
customer_reviews.author: E70421

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Promised
customer_reviews.text: These trellises were exactly what I needed. They look nice and are sturdy enough to last without being overwhelming in the design. The butterflies are a nice touch and add quite a bit to the overall aesthetic. They are attractive enough to display on their own as a nice architectural addon to the overall garden presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Brant P McClure

customer_reviews.title: Lovely trellis
customer_reviews.text: The trellis is beautiful but it is not as sturdy to support the reason for my purchase. However I will use it for a plant that is not so heavy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Carswell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: This was such a good deal; one alone could cost as much as these four.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Packed really well. Very nice product, well designed and made. Easy to install. I could not have made it for less.
customer_reviews.author: R Reviews

customer_reviews.title: great for the price and amount
customer_reviews.text: i needed a trellis and with this product i got 4 for what i would have paid for 2. they look good and they hold my plants very well.
customer_reviews.author: sandra diaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look . Easy to put in the ground or plant containers.
customer_reviews.author: Boo W

customer_reviews.title: Great item to keep plants upright
customer_reviews.text: I like how it is sturdy enough to keep my false indigo tidied up. Very attractive and sturdy. Great deal too. I ordered a second set right after I received the first set.
customer_reviews.author: Gardener

customer_reviews.title: a little frail but the look nice with Austrial roses climbing up them
customer_reviews.text: seems a little frail stands , should have extended ends for securing into the ground had to adjust mine to keep upright
customer_reviews.author: Wm Ratcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Like this product
customer_reviews.text: Nice having it for my deck plants this summer , hopefully many summers...
customer_reviews.author: greenseven

customer_reviews.title: Attractive trellises support plants/vines!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and easy to set up even in my impenetrable soil! Goes in level and doesn’t overpower the fence my son in law erected. Will b easy to move forward to stain fence behind it when needed. Next time would opt for a taller one but with a same pattern. No rust or chipping so far. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful & sturdy. Just what I needed to add decorative touch to a bare outside wall. Also using for a climbing rose. Great!!
customer_reviews.author: anna j stephan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and well made. They were easy to install and actually larger than I thought they would be. I think they are a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth H.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my garden! Well made and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Love the bird design and they are easy and light to carry and install. However they were not packed with much packing materiel for more security.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Got the wrong trellis
customer_reviews.text: While the trellis I received was nice and works as it should, I'm disappointed to have gotten the trellis with three spear looking things instead of the pretty butterfly one. I'm not sure what happened but I was really looking forward to getting the one pictured and nit tye other design I got.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute for the Garden
customer_reviews.text: I have these in my greenbelt bed for the beans to climb. They are smaller in size but perfect for the beans with no sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Ceballos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Trellis
customer_reviews.text: I have a climbing vine in m front garden so i bought this trellis to help hold the vine up. Trellis worked out perfectly, I love it. No assembly required just push it down in the dirt. Liked it so much, I ordered 2 more yesterday. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty trellis. The height and shape are exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty trellis. The height and shape are exactly what I expected. I put it in the space between two windows in the front side of the house. I plan to grow a climbing roses on this trellis. I will train the canes of roses as horizontal as possible to get a flowers wall. Can not wait to see it.
customer_reviews.author: Holy Newland

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I’m using the trellises for Wild morning glories and for sunflower supports. They work well.
customer_reviews.author: Starfall

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly to secure the rose bushes
customer_reviews.text: I loved the solidness of the trellis. It will last a long while to hold up the heavy bushes.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Really attractive. I really love them
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these trellises and decided they were so pretty, I ordered a 3rd and bought new clematis to go along w/ it. I was nervous that they wouldn't be stable enough to stand by themselves, but the prongs that go in the ground are very long and they seem to be ok. Wish they were a foot taller but hey, they won't rot after 2 yrs in the ground like my wooden ones did.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Only shipped one of 4 pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Only shipped one of 4. Flimsey at best. Not as illustrated. I returned for credit.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, so I wasn’t sure... and ended up ordering a second pack! Beautiful, study and well made. Great add to our garden!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Berti

customer_reviews.title: Short trellis
customer_reviews.text: A lot shorter than expected when installed. Very expensive in comparison to what you can pick up in a local garden store.
customer_reviews.author: Star shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, just put it against the wall or ...
customer_reviews.text: When the jasmine plants grown all over the floor. I need a garden trellis. This butterfly garden trellis made of iron with rust proof black coat, so no worry for using outdoor. Easy install, just put it against the wall or stick it into the dirt. Great for climbing plants !
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good Design! Nice Value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bunch of these. Great value for the price. Should be aware, though, that the metal is a bit thin and rusts easily at some joints. Just needs a little spray of clear acrylic or paint. Very useful for veggies, too. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Terpsichore

customer_reviews.title: Pretty trelisses
customer_reviews.text: These trellisses are really pretty so if your plant is small the trellis looks lovely while your plants fill in. They are lightweight so the vines you wish to grow shouldn't be too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put in ground and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: For clematis vines. Very pretty for the vines. Birds like to perch on it. I have them against a stone wall, and that helps provide stability. Not sure they would work in a completely open area.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design. The ends came bent, and I bent the sides trying to straighten and I do not have a lot of strength in these old hands.
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: Horrific packing - heavily damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously packed by someone who didn't give a crap. Arrived broken and bent. Very flimsy carton with no shock absorbing materials to protect contents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trellis panel was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Part was broken off do not have time to have welding back. One panel had the part broken!
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Advertised as 60 " tall, but when stuck into the ground was actually only 45".
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl M.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Don't think they will hold up to Wisconsin winters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... not be very strong but it is holding up great and displays my roses so beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it wound not be very strong but it is holding up great and displays my roses so beautifully. Love it and hope to get some more soon
customer_reviews.author: Sheri McGee

customer_reviews.title: Is nice in big planters!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to be used in big planters with some honeysuckle vine and love how they look. Very pretty and good price for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my garden
customer_reviews.text: Very nice trellis with good height for my roses to climb up. You can’t beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good value and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used for my morning glories. Sturdy but not too heavy
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price for a visually esthetic way to prop up flowering bushes or train climber s onto.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bennett

customer_reviews.title: great garden gadget
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough to Take care of climbing vines and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous. Just what I was looking for for my roses.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Rager

customer_reviews.title: Grabbed a second set I liked them so much
customer_reviews.text: So cute I just ordered a second set. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Thriving blackberries
customer_reviews.text: I used this trellis for my blackberry Vines and it worked so well I bought a second one. Now I'm thinking of getting a third one. My blackberries have thrived since putting them on the trellis.
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these and they are so pretty. The butterflies are huge and the trellises are ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and they are so pretty. The butterflies are huge and the trellises are very sturdy. I think I’ll buy a few more you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional addition to my garden.
customer_reviews.text: These are so lovely that after buying two, I purchased 4 more. I do wish the gauge of the wire was a bit larger but, oh well... no big deal. Nice long tines to push into the dirt to anchor it.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install by using spikes for making holes
customer_reviews.text: Fine for exactly intended use with two rose plants planted to climb trellis...
customer_reviews.author: Mike Slocum

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They're just the right height, lovely design and perfect for my garden to support my roses and other flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Wife is Happy
customer_reviews.text: The Amagabeli 60"x 18" Rustproof Black Iron Butterfly Garden Trellis worked perfectly for our Royal Robe Blue Potato Bush, I"am very happy I bought three of them .
customer_reviews.author: dannyzunino

customer_reviews.title: Won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about them. Decided to spray paint them a 'brilliant blue' which looks fantastic next to the greenery of my garden
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use trellis
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for these for awhile and they’re exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: very pretty for climbing plants and keeping dog out of areas in the yard
customer_reviews.author: canary

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for support for my rose of sharon, this is a beautiful purchase.. Love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: five stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for my star jasmine bush. love the butter flies and like everything about it. i'm very happy with my trellis and would buy another if i want another in my backyard garden .
customer_reviews.author: mary theresa martini

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This butterfly trellis was used for my friend’s climbing plant. She & I loved the design & it works & looks beautiful behind the plant. We went to a few nurseries before buying this one. The price was so much more reasonable for this one and it was delivered as scheduled!
customer_reviews.author: Patty B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice trellis
customer_reviews.text: Overall it was great, just a few leaves were bent. The design was really pretty and it was reasonably priced. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: They work fine. Definitely not very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for our roses. They work fine. Definitely not very heavy duty. The amount of packaging on these were insane for how small they are! They are pretty cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Grabski

customer_reviews.title: My cucumbers love these
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these, sturdy yet lightweight and love the design
